snippet.title: Greg credits Donna Hay for buff body
snippet.content:
GOLFING great Greg Norman has credited Aussie home cook Donna Hay with his recent buff body transformation. A couple of weeks after sharing a naked snap on Instagram, the 62-year-old has declared he's a fan of Hay's style of home cooking.
"Wonderful surprise from my fav chef @donna.hay - adding to our collection," Norman wrote as he held several of Hay's cook books. "Thanks to my mum @toinianorman and @kirstenpnorman for introducing me to her balanced & delicious approach to eating. 'It's not about the diet, it's about the way food makes you feel' - so true! Thanks Donna!!! Am a big fan!" Mid last month, the three-time married Norman made headlines around the world by sharing a nude shot of himself washing in a river in Colorado Flat Top Wilderness. Earlier this year he sported a leg brace and underwent treatment for a torn ligament. Clearly he's made a full recovery thanks to exercise and healthy eating. "Greg is looking fabulous, I'm a fan of his too," Hay told Confidential. "And if I've played any part in his healthy living, I'm thrilled." Originally published as
